name: The Mortal Slime
description:
How to play:

Each wave one of the slimes is the masterming which can be killed, before the other can be killed. If you kill the wrong one, they'll duplicate! Remember which ones they where and find The Only One!

  • AWSD for movement!
  • Shift for Sprint
  • Space for Jumping
  • Left Mouse Click for shooting!
